projects.description: A page that displays random quotes from Star Wars movies. User can click a button to generate new quote, and quote will automatically refresh every 10 seconds
A page that filters list of students and provides pagination links. Each page displays at most 10 students, and includes a search feature to filter the students by name or email
A form page for a fictional conference. User enters information to sign up for the event. Form provides validation for separate fields, and interactivity that responds to user's actions

A Star Wars themed phrase hunter game, using object oriented programming. A random hidden phrase is generated, and user guesses letters with onscren/physical keyboard. If user guesses correct letter, it is shown; guess incorrectly and lose a life. User receives different overlay screens based on whether they win or lose.

A fictional employee directory, using API request to generate new list of employees each time the page loads. API provided by https://randomuser.me/, requested 12 users from the United States. Clicking on an employee displays a modal window with more information about them. There is also a search feature to filter the retreived employees.
